text: == Events == * Khan Kubrat establishes Great Bulgaria. * December – Abu Bakr defeats Mosailima in the Battle of Akraba. * Queen Seondeok is crowned in Korea. * Yazdgird III starts to rule in Persia. * Abu Bakr becomes the first caliph and the Rashidun Caliphate (632-661) is established. That means the first Schism within Islam. == Deaths == * June 8 — Muhammad, prophet of Islam * October 12 — Edwin of Deira, king of Deira and Bretwalda * Charibert II, King of Aquitaine * King Chilperic of Aquitaine
